statements: DELETE FROM trade_surveillance_activities WHERE trader_id = 456 AND trade_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM trade_surveillance_activities WHERE trade_id = 100 AND trader_id = 10;
DELETE FROM trade_surveillance_activities WHERE trade_timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND market_regulations_complied = false;
DELETE FROM market_regulations WHERE compliance_status = false;
DELETE FROM trade_surveillance_activities WHERE trade_amount > 10000 AND trade_symbol = 'AAPL';
DELETE FROM market_regulations WHERE compliance_status = TRUE AND regulation_id = 3;
DELETE FROM surveillance_alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Suspicious Activity';
DELETE FROM surveillance_alerts WHERE alert_type = 'High Risk' AND alert_date < '2022-01-01';
